channel.title: Android bluetooth password logging?
channel.description:
Hello.
I want to ask if theres a way to observe the bluetooth communication of a APP for example a sharing scooter app (Looking at the communication it makes over bluetooth and see the bluetooth password of the scooter when it unlocks the scooter)
Platform is Android 6 rooted.
Is there a APP that can do what I want?

item.title: Android bluetooth password logging?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 121 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
